name: Latest consented drawings available, checked and referenced
All screws installed to correct depth
All serice penetrations cut out and not overcut
Correct screw spacings accurately marked on board and around perimeter
Acoustic sealant between inner and outer layer where specified
Correct lining used as per wall type
Bracing elements complete for correctly screwed as per plan
Correct linings used as per RCP
All butt joints to be back blocked
